00023 #include "optionintattribute.h"

00029 RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntAttribute::OptionIntAttribute(const char* n)
00030                                 :OptionAttribute(OAT_INTEGER){
00031 
00032   LOGI("Constructing an integer OptionAttribute");
00033   this->setName(n);
00034   this->value=0;
00035   this->setStep(1);
00036 
00037 }
00038 
00045 bool RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntAttribute::setValueStr(const char* c){
00046   this->value =StringConv::getSingleton().ctoi(c);
00047   return true;
00048 }
00049 
00055 const char* RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntAttribute::getValueStr() const{
00056   return StringConv::getSingleton().itoc(this->value);
00057 }
00058 
00066 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntAttribute::setStep(unsigned int i){
00067   this->step=i;
00068 }
00069 
00075 unsigned int RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntAttribute::getStep(){
00076   return this->step;
00077 }
00078 
00083 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntAttribute::increase(){
00084   controlStep();
00085   value+=step;
00086 }
00087 
00092 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntAttribute::decrease(){
00093   controlStep();
00094   value-=step;
00095 }
00096 
00102 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntAttribute::controlStep(){
00103   if (step==0)
00104     LOGW("Calling increase or decrease with a step set to 0");
00105 }
00106 
00112 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntAttribute::update(){
00113   if (widget){
00114     FXSpinner* spin=(FXSpinner*)widget;
00115     if (spin){
00116       LOGI("Updating an OptionIntAttribute");
00117       spin->setValue(this->value);
00118     }
00119     else{
00120       LOGW("Cannot get a valid FXSpinner");
00121     }
00122   }
00123   else{
00124     LOGW("Cannot update optionattribute : widget=NULL");
00125   }
00126 }
